findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to unexpected reverts.

findings.title: DoS with Block Gas Limit
findings.description: Denial of Service attack can occur due to block gas limit

findings.title: Gas Usage, Gas Limit and Loops
Redundant fallback function
findings.description: The contract has a redundant fallback function which can lead to unnecessary gas consumption and potential security risks.
